## Autocomplete Examples

Try typing inside the curly braces to see autocomplete suggestions:

### Basic annotation
[This text will be highlighted]{.rn-fragment rn-brackets=left,right rn-padding=10 rn-color=#447099}

### With type specified
[Underlined text]{.rn-fragment rn-type=underline}

### With color (click the color square to open picker)
[Colored highlight]{.rn-fragment rn-type=highlight rn-color=yellow}

### Using brand colors (from _brand.yml)
Type rn-color= and select a brand color - it inserts the hex value:

[Brand primary]{.rn-fragment rn-type=highlight rn-color=}
[Brand accent]{.rn-fragment rn-type=underline rn-color=#EE6331}

### Multiple attributes
[Fancy annotation]{.rn-fragment rn-type=box rn-color=#ff6b6b rn-strokeWidth=2 rn-padding=5}

### Brackets example
[Bracketed text]{.rn-fragment rn-type=bracket rn-brackets=left,right}

### All annotation types
- [highlight]{.rn rn-type=highlight}
- [underline]{.rn rn-type=underline}
- [box]{.rn rn-type=box}
- [circle]{.rn rn-type=circle}
- [strike-through]{.rn rn-type=strike-through}
- [crossed-off]{.rn rn-type=crossed-off}
- [bracket]{.rn rn-type=bracket}

## Test Areas

Type here to test autocomplete:

1. After class: [test]{.rn-fragment }
2. After typing rn-: [test]{.rn-fragment rn-}
3. After equals: [test]{.rn-fragment rn-type=}
